citation.article-title: Thermosporothrix hazakensis gen. nov., sp. nov., isolated from compost and description of Thermosporotrichaceae fam. nov. within the class Ktedonobacteria
citation.source: International Journal of Systematic and Evolutionary Microbiology

p.s: Thermosporothrix (Ther′mo.spo′ro.thrix. Gr. n. therme heat; Gr. n. spora a seed and, in biology, a spore; Gr. fem. n. thrix hair; N.L. fem. n. Thermosporothrix thermophilic spore-forming hair).
Contain glutamic acid, serine, alanine and ornithine as peptidoglycan amino acids.
Cell-wall sugars are rhamnose and mannose.
iso-C17 : 0 is the major fatty acid and MK-9(H2) is the major menaquinone.
The G+C content of the genomic DNA of the type strain of the type species is 54.0 mol%.
The type species is Thermosporothrix hazakensis.
